summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing history record for Jacinto Garcia, detailing his cell assignments and transfers within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from November 2018 to September 2022. It shows his movement between different housing units, ranges, and beds over nearly four years.

persons.name: Jacinto Garcia
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing history record, showing his cell assignments and transfers within the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York from November 2018 to September 2022.

events.title: Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jacinto Garcia's first recorded housing assignment in the MCC New York system, placed in House R, Range 01, Bed 001L.

events.title: Final Recorded Housing Transfer
events.description: Jacinto Garcia's last recorded move from House S, Range 01, Bed 321L, marking the end of the documented housing history.

keyFacts: Jacinto Garcia was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from at least November 2018 to September 2022.
The document shows frequent cell transfers and housing unit changes for Garcia over nearly four years of incarceration.
The housing record uses codes like FTD, BRO, and NYM to indicate different statuses or housing types within the facility.
Garcia's final recorded location was House S, Range 01, Bed 321L, from March 30, 2022, to September 1, 2022.
The document was generated on September 19, 2022, as a quarterly inmate history report from the Bureau of Prisons system.
